remarks.format: ## Remarks 粘贴操作已选择要为，将粘贴的数据格式时，但在实际粘贴数据之前发生的事件。The event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste as, but before the data is actually pasted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含最初实例与存储在相同属性。Initially this property contains a that is identical to that stored in the property. 粘贴事件处理程序的自定义可以指定一个新建议粘贴通过设置此属性。Custom pasting event handlers can specify a new suggested to paste by setting this property. 一个存储在此属性必须具有至少一个数据格式，其中第一个自动应用于时设置此属性的属性。A stored in this property must have at least one data format, the first of which is automatically applied to the property when this property is set.

exception.span: 当尝试将此属性设置为 null 时引发。

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.

exception.span: 尝试将此属性设置为不包含任何数据格式的数据对象时，将会引发该异常。

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to a data object that contains no data formats.
